committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require a store in which a consumer may apply to open a credit or charge card account to display a sign, at each location where the application may be made, containing the same information required by such Act to be prominently placed in a tabular format on the application.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require the conspicuous display in tabular format of mandatory consumer credit disclosures at each location on business premises where a credit or charge card application under an open end credit plan may be submitted by the consumer.
